name: Teste
title: Teste

api_list.name: Users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ramon-teste.p.rapidapi.com/users/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ramon-teste.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ramon-teste.p.rapidapi.com/users/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ramon-teste.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
